rule.name: py/path-injection
rule.description: Uncontrolled data used in path expression

rule.name: py/polynomial-redos
rule.description: Polynomial regular expression used on uncontrolled data

rule.name: py/flask-debug
rule.description: Flask app is run in debug mode

rule.name: py/paramiko-missing-host-key-validation
rule.description: Accepting unknown SSH host keys when using Paramiko

rule.name: py/weak-sensitive-data-hashing
rule.description: Use of a broken or weak cryptographic hashing algorithm on sensitive data

rule.name: py/insecure-default-protocol
rule.description: Default version of SSL/TLS may be insecure
